name: FireChakra
description: Personal assistant web app with React.js, Chakra UI, and Firebase Firestore.
summary:
FireChakra is a mobile-responsive web application designed to serve as an organizer, personal assistant, and planner for users. 
 
  Firebase Firestore is used as the database for this web app, providing users with a secure and scalable way to store their data. Next.js is used as the web framework, providing benefits such as server-side rendering, automatic code splitting, and optimized performance. Authentication functionality is included, allowing users to use their existing Google account to securely log in.

name: Bikeable Santa Rosa

summary: A recording of the project presentation can be found here: https://youtu.be/0WGPyJMQpTM
